hotels.name: Morpheus
hotels.shortDescription: Morpheus is like no other property in Macau, or the world. Book your stay with us to experience this singular vision of the future for yourself.
hotels.description:
Morpheus is like no other property in Macau, or the world.

Step into our high-speed panoramic lifts to discover futuristic living spaces, innovatively designed to transcend your every need. Explore our one-of-a-kind restaurant and lounge collection, featuring world-class chefs like Alain Ducasse and Pierre Hermé. Swim under the stars at the rooftop sky pool.

At Morpheus, ultra-luxury and innovation combine in the form of seven hundred and seventy two futuristic guest rooms and suites. Each of our one hundred and eighty one suites has been outfitted with premium furnishings from the world’s leading designers and cutting-edge technology designed. For an experience of ultimate transcendence, Morpheus’s nine sumptuous villas enjoy personal 24/7 butler service; six connect to private salons, while three offering private interior pools.
hotels.address: Morpheus at City of Dreams, Estrada do Istmo, Cotai, Macau

roomTypes.name: Premier King Room
roomTypes.shortDescription: This beautifully crafted 58-square-meter sanctuary expertly blends timeless materials and luxury décor.
roomTypes.description: This beautifully crafted 58-square-meter sanctuary expertly blends timeless materials and an unprecedented combination of bespoke furniture, luxury décor, and exclusive amenities for you to enjoy during your stay. The Premier King Room is complete with a full range of premium touches including the master in-room control tablet, sensor operated bathroom door, bedroom and bathroom LED TV screens, Hermès toiletries, and a luxurious oversized king bed with 600-thread-count cotton sheets.

roomTypes.name: Premier Double Room
roomTypes.shortDescription: This beautifully crafted 58-square-meter sanctuary expertly blends timeless materials and exclusive amenities.
roomTypes.description: Our most stylish and considered twin room experience. This beautifully crafted 58-square-meter sanctuary expertly blends timeless materials and an unprecedented combination of bespoke furniture, luxury décor, and exclusive amenities for you to enjoy during your stay. The Premier Double Room is complete with a full range of premium touches including the master in-room control tablet, bedroom and bathroom LED TV screens, Hermès toiletries, and two luxurious double beds with 600-thread-count cotton sheets.

roomTypes.description: Discover ultra-modern luxury at every turn in this spacious 80-square-meter suite, a grand space designed to indulge your every need. hotels.name: Nüwa
hotels.shortDescription: A New World of Luxury where Comfort and Style Intertwine.
hotels.description:
Inspired by the eponymous heroine from Chinese mythology, Nüwa is a homage to Asia’s rich cultural inheritance; a place where the past is reimagined, and luxury redefined.

Traditional aesthetics and contemporary sensibility intertwine to create a world of comfort. Handcrafted details are evident in every corner, personalized hospitality awaits at every turn; and every stay is an experience of impeccable standard.

Nüwa has approximate 300 guest rooms including 33 luxurious villas.
hotels.address: Nüwa at City of Dreams, Estrada do Istmo, Cotai, Macau
tags: Place where the past is reimagined

facilities.name: Limousine service
facilities.description: EN Limousine drivers pick up clients and drive them to events and destinations such as weddings, meetings, celebrations, hotels and transportation centers. They also help clients load and unload luggage and carry these items into hotels and airports.

roomTypes.name: Premier Room
roomTypes.shortDescription: Invitingly spacious with spectacular floor-to-ceiling views of Cotai and Taipa, each contemporary styled room offers 60 sqm of pure indulgence.
roomTypes.description: Invitingly spacious with spectacular floor-to-ceiling views of Cotai and Taipa, each contemporary styled Premier Room offers 60sqm of pure indulgence. Relax in complete luxury on the Simmons king mattress dressed in 600 thread-count cotton linen, accompanied with a goose-down duvet and a full selection of pillows to suit your preference. Stimulate your senses with our 42” LCD HDTV and multifunctional iPod docking station. Your private sanctuary also features a walk-in wardrobe and a spacious marble bathroom with an inviting deep-soaker bathtub, separate rain-shower and built-in LCD television.

roomTypes.name: Deluxe Suite
roomTypes.shortDescription: Each suite offers 82sqm of unparalleled comfort and luxury, with a separate lounge area and bedroom, boasting unobstructed, panoramic views of Cotai.
roomTypes.description: Accentuated with luxurious and contemporary touches, the Deluxe Suites at Nüwa are tailored to satisfy our most discerning guests. Each suite offers 82sqm of unparalleled comfort and luxury, with a separate lounge area and bedroom, boasting unobstructed, panoramic views of Cotai. Relax on the Simmons king mattress dressed in 300 thread-count Egyptian cotton linen, accompanied with a goose-down duvet and a full selection of pillows to suit your preference. Stimulate your senses with our 42” LCD HDTV and multifunctional iPod docking station. Your private sanctuary also features a walk-in wardrobe and a spacious marble bathroom with an inviting deep-soaker bathtub, separate rain-shower and built-in LCD television. Every Deluxe Suite is equipped with a 22” flat screen computer station so you can stay connected.

hotels.shortDescription: Stylish and unconventional, The Countdown hotel encapsulates everything you love about City of Dreams.
hotels.description:
Stylish and unconventional, The Countdown hotel encapsulates everything you love about City of Dreams, while we count down to the exciting new experiences the entertainment resort will bring in 2018.

Between now and then, there is always time to enjoy life to the fullest. Drink in the stunning views of Cotai, the beating heart of Macau, as you relax in any of our 326 cozy, well-appointed rooms; or get pampered in our spa, then chill in our pool and Jacuzzi. No matter where you're from or where you're heading – rest assured that time is on your side at The Countdown.
hotels.address: The Countdown Hotel at City of Dreams, Estrada do Is tmo, Cotai, Macau
tags: One of best sellers in Macau

roomTypes.name: Corner Suite
roomTypes.shortDescription: Treat yourself to one of our chic and expansive suites designed for discerning travelers.
roomTypes.description:
Treat yourself to one of our chic and expansive suites designed for discerning travelers. Boasting breathtaking views of Cotai in all its dazzling glory, these innovative suites feature stylish furniture, halo illuminated lighting, ergonomic work stations, greenroom inspired mini-bars, your personal mixologist station and fine linens and plush bedding; while our fashionably styled bathroom features a bathtub, invigorating rain showers and a full range of bathroom amenities.
Technology pulses through the rooms with an integrated video and sound system including 42” flat-screen HDTVs. Plug in or chill out, you have everything you need to connect including complimentary high-speed internet access, satellite television channels, video on-demand and convenient plug-and-play capabilities to connect your iPod, video camera or laptop to the media hub.

roomTypes.name: Deluxe Suite
roomTypes.shortDescription: With spectacular views of Cotai, our Deluxe Suites in king-size bed configuration cover 80 sqm, offering a contemporary, spacious environment.
roomTypes.description:
With spectacular views of Cotai, our Deluxe Suites in king-size bed configuration cover 80 sqm, offering a contemporary, spacious environment for you to enjoy a unique luxurious experience. Create your own delicious cocktail at the mixologist station, stay connected with free Wi-Fi and take advantage of our iHome Bluetooth speaker, satellite television channels and video on-demand.
All of our suites feature fine linens and plush bedding, perfect for recharging for the day ahead.

roomTypes.name: Tourbillon Suite
roomTypes.shortDescription: This ultra-luxurious suite is all about style, sophistication and indulgence, with unique touches like designer décor and state-of-the-art technology to match.
roomTypes.description:
This ultra-luxurious suite is all about style, sophistication and indulgence, with unique touches like designer décor and state-of-the-art technology to match.
With a separate lounge, bar and entertainment area complete with custom made furniture, panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows and unrivalled views, this suite is for those who know how to enjoy life to the fullest. When it’s time to relax, hop into the Jacuzzi with a drink in hand, and start or end your day in fine linens and plush bedding, together with goose-down duvet and pillows. Every little detail in our Tourbillon Suite amounts to an unmatched experience.

hotels.name: Studio City Hotel
hotels.shortDescription: Begin your incredible journey in unique elegance and ultimate luxury at Studio City Hotel.
hotels.description:
NOTE: RiverScape will be closed for renovation from October 1, 2019 through summer of 2020.

Live like a Star in Asia's Entertainment Capital.

Consisting of the Celebrity Tower and the Forbes Five-Star winner Star Tower, the hotel offers 1,600 rooms, all elegantly furnished and complete with services and amenities to match. The Celebrity Tower boasts comfort and style, bringing classic elegance to life with cinematic touches and red carpet services; while the awe-inspiring Star Tower offers lavish suites with spacious living quarters and exclusive facilities to satisfy the most discerning guests. Personalized check-in, private indoor heated pool and health club can be enjoyed by all Star Tower guests.
hotels.address: Studio City Macau, Estrada do Istmo, Cotai, Macau, Macau

roomTypes.name: Celebrity Premium Vista King
roomTypes.shortDescription: Directly facing the Cotai Strip, our Celebrity Premium Vista King offers full panoramic views through its floor-to-ceiling windows
roomTypes.description: Directly facing the Cotai Strip, our Celebrity Premium Vista King offers full panoramic views through its floor-to-ceiling windows. It comes with a luxurious king bed, 300-thread count linen and down feather duvet and pillows – along with a variety of premium amenities and services to bring you complete comfort throughout your stay including: a 42” LCD HDTV, mini bar, free Wi-Fi and 24/7 concierge service.

ratePlans.terms:
• Entertainment Voucher can be used for the purchase of standard adult tickets or standard admission to the following attractions: Golden Reel, Batman Dark Flight, Warner Bros. Fun Zone, FlipOut and Legend Heroes Park at Studio City. Only one MOP100 Entertainment Voucher is accepted for the purchase of one ticket or admission. Each voucher can only be used once and will be collected after use.
  • The outdoor swimming pool will remain open as usual.
  • Star Tower guests as well as Celebrity Suite room guests have exclusive access to our private indoor heated pool and the gym at Star Tower.
  • Cancellation or amendment has to be made 1 day prior to the arrival day before 1800hrs (Local Time). First night room rental plus prevailing taxes will be forfeited for any amendment, cancellation or failure to check-in on the confirmed stay date.
  • Rates quoted are applicable to single and double occupancy only (any guest aged 12 or above counts as an occupant).
  • Celebrity King Room can accommodate up to two adults and one child under 12 years with existing beds; Celebrity Twin Room can accommodate up to two adults and two children under 12 years with existing beds.
  • Celebrity Suite can accommodate up to up to three adults or two adults and two children under 12 years. A surcharge for the third guest of 12 years or over applied. This surcharge applies to hotel stay only and does not cover any other package benefits like show tickets, dining or spa services.
  • All room types of Star Tower can accommodate up to three adults or two adults and two children under 12 years.
  • A surcharge for the third guest of 12 years or over applies at Star Tower. This surcharge applies to hotel stay only and does not cover any other package benefits like show tickets, dining or spa services.

hotels.name: Altira Macau
hotels.shortDescription: Comtemporary luxury at its best.  An oasis with spectacular panoramic views of the Macau Peninsula.
hotels.description: Situated in the heart of Taipa, it is an oasis of sophistication offering spectacular panoramic views of the Macau Peninsula. The extraordinary 38-storey complex features 216 lavishly appointed guest rooms, including 24 deluxe suites and 4 astounding villas, all showcasing an unforgettable skyline. With interiors created by world-renowned designer Peter Remédios, Altira Macau combines comfort and style to elegant effect, offering impeccable service tailored to each guest. The hotel is home to a host of world-class culinary experiences, chic clubs and an award-winning day spa.
hotels.address: Altira Macau, Av. de Kwong Tung, Macau

facilities.name: Limousine service
facilities.description: EN Limousine drivers pick up clients and drive them to events and destinations such as weddings, meetings, celebrations, hotels and transportation centers. They also help clients load and unload luggage and carry these items into hotels and airports.

roomTypes.name: Corner Suite
roomTypes.shortDescription: Take in breathtaking vistas in a cool Corner Suite ready for a lavish celebration.
roomTypes.description:
Take in breathtaking vistas in a cool Corner Suite ready for a lavish celebration. Each of these 16 contemporary spaces is over 88 square meters and includes a lounge area with dining table, corner sofa and 42-inch flat-screen TV.
Every room and suite is complete with gorgeous designer bathrooms featuring a stone circular bathtub, Japanese-style shower, and built-in LCD TV above a double vanity unit.
